channel.title: things on Elie Hymowitz
channel.description: Recent content in things on Elie Hymowitz

item.title: Things
item.description: This is the part of the website where I post some things I’ve made and some things I’ve been working on! Most of the details of how I’m building what I’m working on can be found on my GitHub page. But here you’ll see the end result or at least the work in progress! Graphics I like using Java to make cool visualizations! Check out some of the ones I’ve made recently Robots I use Haply Robotics technology to work on a robot with wheels!
